title: Jalen Rose | Ep 116 | ALL THE SMOKE Full Episode | SHOWTIME Basketball
itunes:title: Jalen Rose | Ep 116 | ALL THE SMOKE Full Episode | SHOWTIME Basketball
description:
ALL THE SMOKE is here with another big-time guest, as the legend finally Jalen Rose joins the show. Rose opens up about the "Fab 5" Michigan Era, his relationship with Chris Webber and the iconic EPSN commercial he did with Kobe. Plus, he discusses his post-basketball media career, his time in the NBA, the 'Malice In The Palace' and the current state of the league, including Kyrie & the Nets. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
